news_header: Researchers have discovered that bacterial cellulose can act as a plant bandage, significantly enhancing healing and regeneration in plants. In experiments, wounds treated with bacterial cellulose patches healed faster and more completely than untreated wounds.
news_original_title: A bacteria-based Band-Aid helps plants heal their wounds
news_text: The patches also improved plant regeneration during cloning experiments. The study suggests potential agricultural applications such as grafting facilitation and preservation of cut plant material.
